text: "Tunnel of Love" is a 1987 song by Bruce Springsteen and is the title track to his eighth studio album Tunnel of Love. It went to number 9 in the United States, number 45 in the United Kingdom, number 17 in Canada, number 22 in Ireland, number 48 in New Zealand and number 39 in the Netherlands. ==References== Category:1987 songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Bruce Springsteen songs
title: Tunnel of Love (Bruce Springsteen song)
